title: Account Settings
description: The place to manage all your account details

desc.profilePicture: Upload a profile picture to personalize your account.
desc.username: The name that identifies you on the platform.
desc.displayName: The name displayed to other users.
desc.email: The email address you use to log in to your account.
desc.password: Set a strong password to protect your account.
desc.dateOfBirth: Set your date of birth, and we'll give you a surprise!
desc.twoFA: Enable two-factor authentication when logging into the system.
